dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1855 IS: United States-Philippines Security Partnership Enhancement Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Hirono (for herself, Mr. Rubio, Mr. Menendez, and Mr. Johnson) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations

form.official-title: To provide special foreign military sales status to the Philippines.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the United States-Philippines Security Partnership Enhancement Act of 2015.

section.header: Special foreign military sales status for the Philippines
section.text: The Arms Export Control Act (22 U.S.C. 2751 et seq.) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in sections 3(d)(2)(B), 3(d)(3)(A)(i), 3(d)(5), 21(e)(2)(A), 36(b), 36(c), 36(d)(2)(A), 62(c)(1), and 63(a)(2), by inserting the Philippines, before or New Zealand each place it appears;
in section 3(b)(2), by inserting the Government of the Philippines, before or the Government of New Zealand; and
in section 21(h), by inserting the Philippines, before or Israel each place it appears.
